overview: Bimba, a teenage temptress, plunges her entire family—including her widowed father, wanton aunt, invalid uncle and even a beloved nun—into the depths of sexual depravity. Is she possessed by demonic lust or just going through a really freaky puberty?
tagline: A teen temptress consumed by the depraved lust of satan!
title: Malabimba: The Malicious Whore
